globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You burst into the facility, weapons drawn, intent on finding and defeating the notorious commander Kayn Somos and sabotaging his anti-Rebellion mission.

Though you're met with heavy resistance, Somos isn't anywhere in sight. You forge ahead through the enemy troops, eager to reach the commander.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when a door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when a door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
You run Somos down, thinking you have him cornered, but his reputation of being elusive holds true. His troops jump in your way to save their commander as he makes a cowardly retreat through the back. While you didn't defeat him, at least you stopped his mission and saved countless Rebel lives.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You realize you were foolish to try to attack a full stormtrooper training facility head on. The pressure is too heavy, forcing you to retreat. You contact as many Rebel supporters in the area as you can, urging them to evacuate.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">Kayn Somos</color> (Trooper Commander) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads deeper into the facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

entityProperties.name: Door 2
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads deeper into the facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

entityProperties.name: Door 3
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads deeper into the facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

globalEvents.name: Target Acquired
globalEvents.eventText:
In the hallway behind the door, a huge man in stormtrooper armor turns his head towards you. "Get them, troopers," he growls.

"Yes, sir, Commander Somos!" Immediately, his soldiers raise their weapons.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door to the Command Hub is locked. The other doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when <color="red">Kayn Somos</color> is defeated.
Block line of sight to <color="red">Kayn Somos</color>.

{-} The door to the Command Hub is locked. The other doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when <color="red">Kayn Somos</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Last Stand
globalEvents.eventText: The door slides open to reveal a large command hub.

entityProperties.name: Command Hub Door
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy door leads into the command hub of the facility.

{-} The door is locked.

eventActions.theText: Somos stands battered, but not defeated.
Somos is flanked by two enormous laser cannons. Menacingly, he points in your direction, ordering the attack.

{-} Each E-Web Engineer has *2* health instead of its listed health.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Kayn Somos</color> is defeated a second time.
Block line of sight to <color="red">Kayn Somos</color>.

{-} Each E-Web Engineer has *2* health instead of its listed health.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Kayn Somos</color> is defeated a second time.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Strategic Withdrawal
globalEvents.eventText:
Wounded, Somos staggers into the command hub and the blast door closes behind him.

{-} The door to the Command Hub is unlocked to Rebel figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Command Hub opens.

entityProperties.name: Command Hub Door
entityProperties.theText:
A blast door leads into the command hub of the facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the Command Hub door.
Follow Somos into the Command Hub.

{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Command Hub opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.
